# Ultimate Beauty Spa — Douala, Cameroon

> Premium spa and beauty salon located at Avant Saint James hôtel, Bonamoussadi, Douala, Cameroon. Open daily 9 AM – 9 PM.

Ultimate Beauty Spa is Douala's premier beauty and wellness destination offering luxury treatments for men and women. We combine traditional wellness techniques with modern innovation in a refined, elevated setting.

## Services

- **Massage & Relaxation**: Deep tissue massage, hot stone therapy, relaxation massage, and stress relief treatments. Starting from XAF 10,000.
- **Wet Spa & Hydrotherapy**: Jacuzzi baths, hammam steam room, aromatherapy sessions, and sleep therapy. Starting from XAF 10,000.
- **Face Care & Facials**: Deep cleansing, hydration, anti-aging treatments, acne control, brightening, and detox facials. Starting from XAF 12,000.
- **Haircuts & Styling**: Precision cuts and expert styling for men and women — classic through modern trends. Starting from XAF 2,000.
- **Hair Coloring**: Professional coloring from subtle highlights to bold transformations with premium products. Starting from XAF 5,000.
- **Braiding, Locs & Protective Styles**: Expert braiding, loc maintenance, and protective hairstyling. Starting from XAF 3,000.
- **Shaving & Beard Care**: Traditional hot towel shaves, beard sculpting, and grooming rituals. Starting from XAF 2,000.
- **Manicure & Pedicure**: Classic, gel, acrylic nails, and nail art for flawless hands and feet. Starting from XAF 3,000.
